channel.title: The Nextcloud Podcast
channel.googleplay:author: Nextcloud
channel.itunes:author: Nextcloud
channel.itunes:subtitle: Stay up to date with the Nextcloud community!
channel.itunes:summary: The Nextcloud Podcast interviews Nextcloud community members, contributors, users and others, keeping you up to date on what is happening.
channel.description: The Nextcloud Podcast interviews Nextcloud community members, contributors, users and others, keeping you up to date on what is happening.
channel.itunes:keywords: Nextcloud, open source, self-hosting, cloud, community, programming, privacy, security

item.title: Interview with Matthieu Gallien, Senior Software Engineer at Nextcloud
item.itunes:subtitle: In this 13th episode, our host Ingo talked with Matthieu Gallien, Senior Software Engineer at Nextcloud, responsible for Desktop client.
item.itunes:summary: Matthieu covers interesting topics of Desktop Client such as Sync Client, how it works, and the new features like Virtual files, Speedup sync, E2E encryption, and more.
item.description: Matthieu covers interesting topics of Desktop Client such as Sync Client, how it works, and the new features like Virtual files, Speedup sync, E2E encryption, and more.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Interview with Nimisha Vijay, UX and UI Designer at Nextcloud
item.itunes:subtitle: In this 12th episode, our host Ingo talked with Nimisha Vijay, UX and UI Designer at Nextcloud.
item.itunes:summary: Find more about UX Design in general and Nimisha's experience as a designer at Nextcloud!
item.description: Find more about UX Design in general and Nimisha's experience as a designer at Nextcloud!
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Nextcloud podcast episode pt. 11: Interview with Sebastian and Michael from hosting.de!
item.itunes:subtitle: In this 11th episode, our host Ingo talked with Sebastian Holländer, the Product owner and Michael Ernst, the Chief Software Officer at hosting.de.
item.itunes:summary: Learn more about what hosting.de is, how and why they chose Nextcloud, and the simple and quick steps of getting started with Nextcloud, either as a home or business user.
item.description: Learn more about what hosting.de is, how and why they chose Nextcloud, and the simple and quick steps of getting started with Nextcloud, either as a home or business user.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Interview with Michael Meeks, the General Manager of Collabora Productivity
item.itunes:subtitle: In this 10th episode, our host Ingo talked with Michael Meeks, the General Manager of Collabora Productivity.
item.itunes:summary: In this 10th episode, our host Ingo talked with Michael Meeks, Open Source developer and General Manager of Collabora Productivity, leading Collabora Online and Office products, supporting customers, and consulting on development alongside his team.
item.description: In this 10th episode, our host Ingo talked with Michael Meeks, the enthusiastic Open Source developer and General Manager of Collabora Productivity, leading Collabora Online and Office products, supporting customers, and consulting on development alongside his team.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Interview with Marco Nöchel and Thorsten Krüger from HKN
item.itunes:subtitle: In this 9th-episode, our host Ingo talked with Marco Nöchel and Thorsten Krüger from HKN
item.itunes:summary: In this 9th-episode, our host Ingo talked with Marco Nöchel, the CEO, and engineer Thorsten Krüger from HKN GmbH, which is the biggest multi-region German Openstack Cloud, and Nextcloud silver partner.
item.description: In this 9th-episode, our host Ingo talked with Marco Nöchel, the CEO, and engineer Thorsten Krüger from HKN GmbH, which is the biggest multi-region German Openstack Cloud, and Nextcloud silver partner.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Podcast No. 8 - Interview with Arthur Schiwon about Nextcloud Flow
item.itunes:subtitle: In this eight-episode, our host Ingo talked with Arthur, Senior Software Engineer at Nextcloud, about Nextcloud Flow.
item.itunes:summary: In this eight-episode, our host Ingo talked with Arthur, Senior Software Engineer at Nextcloud, about Nextcloud Flow. Nextcloud Flow is the workflow engine of Nextcloud.
item.description: In this eight-episode, our host Ingo talked with Arthur, the Senior Software Engineer at Nextcloud about Nextcloud Flow. Nextcloud Flow is the workflow engine of Nextcloud.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Interview with Stefan Niedermann, an amazing community member!
item.itunes:subtitle: On our seventh podcast, Ingo talks to one of our community members, Stefan Niedermann about how he started contributing to Nextcloud and developing Nextcloud Notes and Nextcloud Deck app.
item.itunes:summary: On our seventh podcast, Ingo talks to our community member, Stefan Niedermann about his work and how he started contributing to Nextcloud and developing Nextcloud Notes and Nextcloud Deck app.
item.description: On our seventh podcast, Ingo talks to an amazing community member, Stefan Niedermann about how he started contributing to Nextcloud and developing Nextcloud Notes and Nextcloud Deck app.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Nextcloud’s first-hand work experience: Life and X-mas in Hawaii
item.itunes:subtitle: On our sixth podcast, Ingo talks to Edeltraut about remote work experience, life and X-mas in Hawaii
item.itunes:summary: Edeltraut had the opportunity to work for Nextcloud from different locations and here’s her story from her current location: tuning in directly from Hawaii!
item.description: Edeltraut had the opportunity to work for Nextcloud from different locations and here’s her story from her current location: tuning in directly from Hawaii!
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Interview with Björn about federation, sharing and sales engineering
item.itunes:subtitle: On our fifth podcast, Ingo talks to Nextcloud sales engineer Björn about his work and Nextcloud sharing features.
item.itunes:summary: A brief discussion with the Nextcloud sales engineering team lead about sales and engineering, as well as the Nextcloud features around sharing between Nextcloud servers (federation), global address books and how Nextcloud makes it easier to keep your data private.
item.description: A brief discussion with the Nextcloud sales engineering team lead about sales and engineering, as well as the Nextcloud features around sharing between Nextcloud servers (federation), global address books and how Nextcloud makes it easier to keep your data private.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Interview with Rhys Davies from Canonical
item.itunes:subtitle: On our fourth podcast, host Ingo interviews Rhys Davies from Canonical about the Nextcloud Ubuntu Appliance.
item.itunes:summary: On our fourth podcast, host Ingo interviews Rhys Davies from Canonical about the Nextcloud Ubuntu Appliance. Find out what the Ubuntu appliances are all about, and what the benefits of Nextcloud as an appliance are.
item.description: On our fourth podcast, host Ingo interviews Rhys Davies from Canonical about the Nextcloud Ubuntu Appliance. Find out what the Ubuntu appliances are all about, and what the benefits of Nextcloud as an appliance are.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Frank Karlitschek on remote working
item.itunes:subtitle: Our third episode is a conversation about remote work with Nextcloud CEO Frank Karlitschek.
item.itunes:summary: On our third podcast, host Ingo discusses working remote with Nextcloud CEO Frank Karlitschek. Nextcloud is a company centered around remote work, hiring the best and most motivated people wherever they live. With some team members as far from our Stuttgart office as Hawaii and Cape Verde force us to work efficiently across time zones and vast distances. Frank and Ingo cover the what, why and how of working remotely, and discuss how Nextcloud itself is an important tool in how we collaborate.
item.description: On our third podcast, host Ingo discusses working remote with Nextcloud CEO Frank Karlitschek. Nextcloud is a company centered around remote work, hiring the best and most motivated people wherever they live. With some team members as far from our Stuttgart office as Hawaii and Cape Verde force us to work efficiently across time zones and vast distances. Frank and Ingo cover the what, why and how of working remotely, and discuss how Nextcloud itself is an important tool in how we collaborate.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Part two of our conversation with Nextcloud designer, Jan
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode we continue our conversation and turn towards the subject of design.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we continue our conversation and turn towards the subject of design.
item.description: In this episode we continue our conversation and turn towards the subject of design. What is design, how does Nextcloud do it and why is it so important?
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Welcome to our first Nextcloud Podcast!
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode we introduce the Nextcloud Podcast.
item.itunes:summary: In this very first episode we introduce our podcast, discussing with Nextcloud designer and community manager Jan Christoph Borchardt what our podcast will be covering going forward.
item.description: In this very first episode we introduce our podcast, discussing with Nextcloud designer and community manager Jan Christoph Borchardt what our podcast will be covering going forward.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud
